videos.title: Shit Robot "Take 'Em Up" (2010)
videos.description: The music video for "Take 'Em Up" by Shit Robot, featuring Nancy Whang, merges retro and modern visuals to create a vibrant, psychedelic effect. Set against an electro-disco track, the video shows characters in colorful 80s outfits moving through surreal cityscapes with playful animations and dynamic edits, enhancing the song's upbeat rhythm. Rotoscoping by Magdelena Turnier, Jairo Neto, Camilo Rosas, Brett Bittner, Atsushi Yamamoto, Eoin Whelehan and Chris Mooney. Contributed by Till Brokhausen.
videos.additional_info:
Shit Robot "Take 'Em Up" (2010)

Rotoscoping by Magdelena Turnier, Jairo Neto, Camilo Rosas, Brett Bittner, Atsushi Yamamoto, Eoin Whelehan and Chris Mooney. Contributed by Till Brokhausen.
Technique - Echo print
Director - Eoghan Kidney

videos.title: Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Alright" by Victoria Monét, directed by Dave Meyers, is a vibrant homage to Janet Jackson, featuring high-energy choreography and striking visuals. In the video, Monét channels Jackson's iconic style, wearing a black-and-white fedora and suit, and performing dynamic dance routines reminiscent of Jackson's 1990s and 2000s era. The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.
videos.additional_info:
Victoria Monet - Alright (2024)

The video, choreographed by Sean Bankhead, showcases Monét's impressive dance skills and captures the essence of liberation and celebration. Made in collaboration with Jacobi Mehringer, Anna Arnell, and Mia Barnes.

videos.title: Travis Scott - FE!N (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "Fe!n" by Travis Scott featuring Playboi Carti was released on March 30, 2024, on Scott's YouTube channel via Vevo and directed by Gabriel Moses. The song itself, part of Scott's album "Utopia," has been praised for its unique composition and contributions from both artists, showcasing a new vocal delivery by Carti and Scott's titular chorus.
videos.additional_info:

The song itself, part of Scott's album "Utopia," has been praised for its unique composition and contributions from both artists, showcasing a new vocal delivery by Carti and Scott's titular chorus.

videos.title: Duplication clip by Matthias Brown (2013)
videos.additional_info:
Duplication clip by Matthias Brown (2013)
Animation from artist Matthias Brown, also known as 'TraceLoops'. In this clip, we're seeing the combination of rotoscoped heads from the same person rotating along an X-axis in a black 'void-like' environment, as though on a lazy-susan. It's easy to identify a duplication technique from the clip. Harder to pick between 'Echo printing' and 'Double exposure'. We labeled it as both since it has properties from both techniques. Like most clips, there isn't a clear-cut category it fits under.
Technique - Double Exposure , Duplication , Echo print , Void
Director - Matthias Brown (TraceLoops)
Original Source - Link

ROTATE

BLACK AND WHITE
LAZY SUSAN

videos.title: Omega - Road to the Olympics (2024)
videos.description: The "Omega - Road to the Olympics 2024" commercial celebrates Omega's role as the Official Timekeeper for the Paris 2024 Olympics, a position they've held since 1932. The commercial features athletes training and competing, emphasizing Omega's precision and innovation in timekeeping technology. It also highlights the launch of a special edition Seamaster watch, designed to commemorate the upcoming Olympics.
videos.additional_info:

videos.title: Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
videos.description: In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
videos.additional_info:

This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.

videos.title: Shit Robot "Take 'Em Up" (2010)
videos.description: The music video for "Take 'Em Up" by Shit Robot, featuring Nancy Whang, merges retro and modern visuals to create a vibrant, psychedelic effect. Set against an electro-disco track, the video shows characters in colorful 80s outfits moving through surreal cityscapes with playful animations and dynamic edits, enhancing the song's upbeat rhythm. Rotoscoping by Magdelena Turnier, Jairo Neto, Camilo Rosas, Brett Bittner, Atsushi Yamamoto, Eoin Whelehan and Chris Mooney. Contributed by Till Brokhausen.
videos.additional_info:
Shit Robot "Take 'Em Up" (2010)

videos.title: Oddworld x Souly - wzf / maybach (2024)
videos.description: The music video for "WZF / Maybach" by Oddworld x Souly is a visually striking and dynamic production. The video features high-energy performances and a mix of urban and futuristic aesthetics. With vibrant colors and fast-paced edits, the visual storytelling complements the rhythm and intensity of the track. The artists are showcased in various locations, including industrial backdrops and sleek, modern settings, adding to the video's edgy and stylish vibe. The direction creatively blends elements of hip-hop culture with innovative visual effects, making it a captivating watch from start to finish.
videos.additional_info:
Oddworld x Souly - wzf / maybach (2024)

The artists are showcased in various locations, including industrial backdrops and sleek, modern settings, adding to the video's edgy and stylish vibe. The direction creatively blends elements of hip-hop culture with innovative visual effects, making it a captivating watch from start to finish.

videos.title: Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)
videos.description: In the 2024 music video 'Risk It All' directed by Dave Meyers, Usher and H.E.R. deliver an emotionally charged performance, underscored by contemporary dance, on a rotating platform in a dimly lit setting. The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.
videos.additional_info:
Usher, H.E.R. - Risk It All (2024)

The video, known for its sophisticated yet steamy ambiance, culminates in a poignant moment with Usher tearfully singing the final note. This collaboration is a standout part of 'The Color Purple' soundtrack, showcasing the artistic depth and vulnerability of both artists.

videos.title: Lil Nas X, Youngboy Never Broke Again - Late To Da Party (2022)
videos.description: The music video for "Late to da Party (F*ck BET)" by Lil Nas X and YoungBoy Never Broke Again features provocative imagery, including Lil Nas X urinating on a BET Award, to criticize and satirize the entertainment industry, particularly for Lil Nas X's exclusion from BET Awards nominations.

videos.title: Ken Carson - Fighting My Demons (2023)
videos.description: The music video for "Fighting My Demons" by Ken Carson, directed by Cole Bennett, was released in 2023 and features unique, glitchy visuals. The video presents a series of grainy, 3D footage that gives off the impression of being shot with night-vision goggles, offering a surreal viewing experience. It mainly showcases Ken Carson partying and performing his lyrics, creating a montage that aligns with the song's themes. The video's eerie and dark aesthetics were noted for drawing inspiration from the style of 1990s Japanese cinema, culminating in a profound, existential moment where Ken faces a haunting black void, adding depth and narrative to the visual experience.
videos.additional_info:

It mainly showcases Ken Carson partying and performing his lyrics, creating a montage that aligns with the song's themes. The video's eerie and dark aesthetics were noted for drawing inspiration from the style of 1990s Japanese cinema, culminating in a profound, existential moment where Ken faces a haunting black void, adding depth and narrative to the visual experience.

videos.title: Botis Seva - Santo (2022)
videos.additional_info:
Botis Seva - Santo (2022)
Botis Seva, award-winning choreographer, explores the power of storytelling through images and motion.The film is a collaboration between Botis Seva and film director Freddie Leyden. The result, Santo, is an intimate expression of faith inspired by ancient Greek and Roman sculpture and religious scenes in medieval books of hours.

videos.title: Omega - Road to the Olympics (2024)
videos.description: The "Omega - Road to the Olympics 2024" commercial celebrates Omega's role as the Official Timekeeper for the Paris 2024 Olympics, a position they've held since 1932. The commercial features athletes training and competing, emphasizing Omega's precision and innovation in timekeeping technology. It also highlights the launch of a special edition Seamaster watch, designed to commemorate the upcoming Olympics.
videos.additional_info:
